It aims to make transactions more effici: It aims to make transactions more efficient, secure, and eco-friendly by shifting from paper-based to digital processes.
Giver leverages blockchain and smart con: Giver leverages blockchain and smart contracts to ensure transparency and connect carbon credit buyers with sellers easily.
The Giver Token platform streamlines sec: The Giver Token platform streamlines secure, transparent carbon credit trading via blockchain, enabling global transactions without geographical limits. It connects users to the growing carbon credit market, helping reduce emissions and support certified carbon reduction projects.
Net Zero Together Description: 'Net Zero Together' is a collaborative initiative led by Team Giver, focused on creating a sustainable future by achieving carbon neutrality. Through collective action, innovative solutions, and community engagement, we aim to minimize our environmental impact and ensure a cleaner, greener planet for future generations. Together, with Team Giver, we can lead the way to net zero emissions, empowering individuals and organizations to contribute to this critical global goal.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.section_title_1: It Is A Critical Component Of Modern Business
about_us.mission_vision_content: Our team recognizes the issue of global warming and wants to be part of the movement towards achieving net-zero emissions. However, the current carbon credit trading system still uses paper and plastic money, which generates significant carbon emissions during production. Therefore, we have adopted blockchain technology for carbon credit trading to reduce the use of fiat currency.
about_us.partner_content: Our partners are a team of experts in waste management, both on land and at sea. They have identified ways to reduce and offset carbon dioxide emissions. The development team and our partners have therefore collaborated to create this project.

investmentFunds.title: Source of investment funds
investmentFunds.description: The funds will be used to support small-scale farmers in joining the T-Ver program to meet carbon credit standards. We will then use these funds to purchase carbon credits and sell them on our platform.

faq.faq_title: Presale FAQ about Fundraising and Tokens
faq.faq1_question: What will the funds raised be used for?
faq.faq1_answer: The funds will be used to purchase carbon credits from farmers and provide financial support to farmers who have not yet joined the T-VER project. This aims to promote greenhouse gas reduction and create sustainability for farming communities.
faq.faq2_question: Why are the tokens locked for 2 years?
faq.faq2_answer: Since this project requires considerable time and coordination with multiple parties, we are locking the tokens for 2 years to ensure stability in the project's execution. During this 2-year period, the tokens will remain locked, and investors will receive a 20% bonus when the tokens are unlocked.
faq.faq3_question: What are the special benefits for those who purchase tokens during the Pre-sale?
faq.faq3_answer:
Those who purchase tokens during the Pre-sale will receive several exclusive benefits, including:
 • Access to the Stake Pool 3 months before IDO investors
 • Early access to the Carbon Credit trading platform 3 months ahead of general investors
 • Their names will be recorded in the Pre-sale database, giving them faster access to additional special privileges in the future.
